data.name: Don't Starve Together: Hallowed Nights Survivors Chest
data.detailed_description:
Hallowed Nights Survivors Chest
Once upon an autumn dreary, while you’re browsing, weak and weary,
Over contents in the Don’t Starve Together Store.
The Hallowed Nights Survivors Chest, with characters in fancy dress,
Appears on offer to use in-game forevermore.

Includes
  • The Mad Scientist Chest
  • The Woeful Chest
  • The Supernatural Chest
  • The Unfinished Chest
  • The Pierrot Chest
  • The Rebel Chest

data.short_description: This Hallowed Nights Chest contains the complete survivors Hallowed Nights series. Contains skins for: Wilson, Willow, Wendy, Webber, Wes, and WX-78.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
